## Some Mathematics Web Toys

### GAP-system Shell:

Warning: GAP-system in browser is RAM-intensive and clicking this button will download 1GB data files.

```{=html}
<div id="gap-container" style="text-align: center; margin: 20px 0;">
  
  <button id="btn-launch-gap" class="btn btn-primary">
    Start GAP Shell
  </button>

</div>

<script>
  document.getElementById('btn-launch-gap').addEventListener('click', function() {
    const container = document.getElementById('gap-container');
    
    // Create the iframe element
    const iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
    iframe.src = "gap-wasm/index.html"; 
    
    // Styling to match the 'no white area' request
    iframe.style.width = "100%";
    iframe.style.height = "500px"; // Adjust height as needed
    iframe.style.border = "none";
    iframe.style.backgroundColor = "#000"; // Prevents white flash while loading
    iframe.style.display = "block";
    
    // Clear the button and append the iframe
    container.innerHTML = '';
    container.appendChild(iframe);
  });
</script>
<script src="coi-serviceworker.js"></script>
